name: Protector of Droknar's Light
description: A flicker of light in this strange, new world.
requirement: Successfully complete events around Droknar's Light.

bits.text: Escort Forgemaster Elrik while He Searches for Forge Materials
Bring High Quality Billet to Forgemaster Elrik
Defeat the Champion Demon Corrupted Dwarf
Help the Dwarves Stabilize Condensed Magic around Droknar's Light
Find and Remove Hidden Stone Summit Agents
Defend Droknar's Light from the Invasion
Help the Djinn Vanquish Their Ancient Enemy
Help Battlemaster Flintfoot Prepare Trainees for Combat
Defeat the Champion Avatar of Despair
Defeat the Champion Engorged Ice Elemental
